buttonDefaultTitle.description: Hover on the Talkie button, dynamically set.
buttonDefaultTitle.message: Waca pilihan teks kanthi banter nganggo $NAME$
buttonDefaultTitle.original: Read text selection out loud with $NAME$

buttonDefaultTitle_Static.description: Hover on the Talkie button, set from manifest.json.
buttonDefaultTitle_Static.message: Waca pilihan teks kanthi banter nganggo Talkie
buttonDefaultTitle_Static.original: Read text selection out loud with Talkie

extensionDescription.description: For the browsers/web stores. Maximum 132 characters.
extensionDescription.message: Cepet, gampang, lan kualitas teks kanggo wicara ing luwih saka 40 basa. Maca kanthi banter saka situs web, PDF, email. Ngomong teks nganggo TTS.
extensionDescription.original: Fast, easy, high-quality text to speech in over 40 languages. Read out loud from websites, PDF, email. Speak text with TTS.

frontend_PopupUsageShort.message: Pilih teks sing dikarepake ing kaca web lan klik Talkie ing toolbar browser.
frontend_PopupUsageShort.original: Select desired text on any web page and click the Talkie button in your browser toolbar.

frontend_aboutIssuesOnGithubLinkText.message: Panjaluk fitur lan laporan bug ing Github
frontend_aboutIssuesOnGithubLinkText.original: Feature requests and bug reports on Github

frontend_faq001A.message: Swara kasebut asale saka sistem operasi (Windows, ChromeOS, macOS, Linux, lsp) lan browser saiki (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Firefox, lsp). Iki uga ateges sampeyan bisa ngundhuh lan nginstal swara sing Talkie , urip maneh komputer, lan Talkie kudu ngenali kanthi otomatis. Sampeyan uga bisa nyoba nggunakake browser sing beda, amarga dhukungan swara bisa uga beda sanajan ing sistem sing padha.
frontend_faq001A.original: The voices come from both from the operating system (Windows, ChromeOS, macOS, Linux, etcetera) and your current browser (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Firefox, etcetera). This also means that you can download and install any voices you would like to have, reboot your computer, and Talkie should recognize them automatically. You can also try using a different browser, as voice support may differ even on the same system.

frontend_faq001Q.message: Kepiye carane Talkie ndeteksi swara sing diinstal?
frontend_faq001Q.original: How does Talkie detect installed voices?

frontend_faq002A.message: Sampeyan bisa nambah swara liyane saka Microsoft lan liyane. Sing paling gampang yaiku nambah basa anyar ing setelan sistem. Priksa manawa sampeyan uga nginstal swara kanggo basa kasebut. Waca pandhuan instalasi sing kapisah.
frontend_faq002A.original: You can add more voices from both Microsoft and others. The easiest is to add a new language in the system settings. Make sure you also install the voice for the language. See separate installation instructions.

frontend_faq002Q.message: Kepiye carane nginstal swara liyane ing Talkie ing Microsoft Windows?
frontend_faq002Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Microsoft Windows?

frontend_faq003A.message: Sampeyan bisa kanthi gampang nginstal swara lan basa tambahan ing setelan sistem. Voices kanggo ChromeOS uga kasedhiya ing Toko Web Chrome.
frontend_faq003A.original: You can easily install additional voices and language in the system settings. Voices for ChromeOS may also be available in the Chrome Web Store.

frontend_faq003Q.message: Kepiye carane nginstal swara liyane ing Talkie ing Google ChromeOS?
frontend_faq003Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Google ChromeOS?

frontend_faq004A.message: Swara tambahan bisa gampang diinstal saka preferensi sistem macOS kanggo wicara. Waca pandhuan instalasi sing kapisah.
frontend_faq004A.original: Additional voices can be easily installed from the macOS system preferences for speech. See separate installation instructions.

frontend_faq004Q.message: Kepiye carane nginstal swara liyane ing Talkie ing Apple macOS?
frontend_faq004Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Apple macOS?

frontend_faq005A.message: Iku gumantung ing distribusi Linux, browser, lan sistem distribusi paket sing sampeyan gunakake. Deleng instruksi instalasi sing kapisah kanggo kombinasi piranti lunak. Sing paling gampang yaiku nyoba browser liyane lan ndeleng manawa swara kasebut wis diinstal sadurunge. Contone, Firefox v95 ing Ubuntu 21.10 bisa diinstal nggunakake Aptitude utawa Snap; mantan kalebu 8611 eSpeak voices mbisakake 95 basa ing 7358 dialek, nanging terakhir kalebu 0 voices. Conto liyane yaiku Google Chrome v96 ing Ubuntu 21.10, sing kanthi standar kalebu 19 swara sing ngidini 14 basa ing 18 dialek. Ayo kula ngerti apa pengalaman sampeyan!
frontend_faq005A.original: It depends on which Linux distribution, browser, and package distribution system you use. See separate installation instructions for your combination of software. The easiest might be to try another browser and see if it has a suitable voice preinstalled. For example, Firefox v95 on Ubuntu 21.10 can be installed using Aptitude or Snap; the former includes 8611 eSpeak voices enabling 95 languages in 7358 dialects, but the latter includes 0 voices. Another example is Google Chrome v96 on Ubuntu 21.10, which by default includes 19 voices enabling 14 languages in 18 dialects. Please let me know what your experiences are!

frontend_faq005Q.message: Kepiye carane nginstal swara liyane ing Talkie ing Linux?
frontend_faq005Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Linux?

frontend_faq006A.message: Ya lan ora. Talkie ora kalebu swara dhewe, nanging nggunakake swara sing wis diinstal ing komputer. Sampeyan bisa nginstal swara tambahan sing dikarepake.
frontend_faq006A.original: Yes and no. Talkie does not include any voices in itself, but uses the voices which are already installed on your computer. You can install any additional voices you would like.

frontend_faq006Q.message: Apa sampeyan bisa nambah dhukungan kanggo <swara anyar> ing Talkie ?
frontend_faq006Q.original: Can you add support for <a new voice> in Talkie?

frontend_faq007A.message: Ya lan ora. Nalika Talkie nggunakake swara sing diinstal ing komputer, sampeyan kudu nginstal swara anyar sing ndhukung basa sing pengin digunakake.
frontend_faq007A.original: Yes and no. As Talkie uses the voices which are installed on your computer, you need to install a new voice which supports the language you would like to use.

frontend_faq007Q.message: Apa sampeyan bisa nambah dhukungan kanggo <basa anyar> ing Talkie ?
frontend_faq007Q.original: Can you add support for <a new language> in Talkie?

frontend_faq008A.message: Ya, yen swara sing diinstal uga kasedhiya offline. Sampeyan bisa ndeleng ing dhaptar swara sing ditandhani minangka online.
frontend_faq008A.original: Yes, if the voices installed are also available offline. You can see in the list of voices which are marked as online.

frontend_faq009A.message: Ora, Talkie Premium nduweni swara sing padha karo Talkie. Sampeyan bisa nginstal swara liyane ing sistem, lan padha kasedhiya. Ing Talkie Premium sampeyan bisa ngatur swara sing disenengi saben basa lan dialek.
frontend_faq009A.original: No, Talkie Premium has the exact same voices as Talkie. You can install more voices on your system, and they are equally available. In Talkie Premium you are able to customize the preferred voice per language and dialect though.

frontend_faq009Q.message: Apa Talkie Premium duwe swara luwih Talkie tinimbang Talkie?
frontend_faq009Q.original: Does Talkie Premium have more voices than Talkie?

frontend_faq010A.message: Google Chrome (lan bisa uga browser adhedhasar Chromium liyane) duwe masalah/bug iki wiwit paling sethithik taun 2014. Talkie duwe sawetara solusi, lan pilihan kanggo ngaktifake/mateni maca teks ing bagean sing luwih cendhek. Aku bakal terus nambah solusi, nanging nganti tim Chromium bisa digunakake, bisa uga ora bisa 100%. Yen sampeyan ngalami masalah iki, kabari aku browser lan versi, sistem operasi lan versi, lan basa/swara sing sampeyan gunakake.
frontend_faq010A.original: Google Chrome (and presumably other Chromium based browsers) have had this issue/bug since at least year 2014. Talkie has some workarounds in place, and an option to enable/disable reading text in shorter parts. I will continue to improve the workaround, but until the Chromium team works it might not work 100%. If you experience this issue, please let me know which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using.

frontend_faq010Q.message: Napa Talkie mandheg maca sawise 20-30 tembung utawa sawetara detik?
frontend_faq010Q.original: Why does Talkie stop reading after 20-30 words or a few seconds?

frontend_faq011A.message: Ana rong alasan. Sepisanan, yen swara aktif online iku perlu kanggo ngundhuh file wicara sadurunge muter. Iki tegese jeda tambahan sing gumantung saka kacepetan sambungan internet sampeyan. Sampeyan bisa mriksa swara sing online ing dhaptar swara. Alesan kapindho yaiku solusi kanggo ngucapake teks sing dawa ngethok teks ing bagean sing luwih cendhek, biasane saben ukara utawa saben klausa. Iki bisa nambah jeda ekstra kanggo saben jeda. Sampeyan bisa ngaktifake maca teks dawa minangka salah siji bagéan saka opsi, kang kudu mbusak ngaso ing sistem didhukung.
frontend_faq011A.original: There are two reasons. Firstly, if the active voice is online it needs to download the speech file before playing it. This means an added pause which is depending on your internet connection speed. You can check which voices are online in the list of voices. The second reason is that the workaround for speaking long texts chops up the text in shorter parts, usually per sentence or per clause. This can add an extra pause for each pause. You can enable reading long texts as one part in the options, which should remove the pause on supported systems.

frontend_faq011Q.message: Apa Talkie kadang-kadang jeda dawa antarane ukara lan tembung?
frontend_faq011Q.original: Why does Talkie sometime have a long pause between sentences and words?

frontend_faq012A.message: Sayange, ora lengkap. Kanggo Talkie Premium bisa nyalin teks, lan maca saka clipboard. Pranyata Google Docs (uga Google Spreadsheet, Google Drive, lan liya-liyane) dudu situs web, nanging "aplikasi ing browser" khusus sing digawe Google. Talkie ora bisa ngakses teks sing dipilih, utawa nambah item menu konteks, Talkie tombol Talkie ora bisa digunakake.
frontend_faq012A.original: Unfortunately, not fully. For Talkie Premium users it is possible to copy text, and read it from the clipboard. It turns out that Google Docs (as well as Google Spreadsheet, Google Drive, and similar) is not a website, but a special "application in the browser" created by Google. Talkie cannot access the selected text, nor add context menu items, so the Talkie button does not work.

frontend_faq012Q.message: Apa Talkie bisa digunakake ing Google Docs?
frontend_faq012Q.original: Does Talkie work in Google Docs?

frontend_faq013A.message: Ya, mangga! Luwih becik nggawe laporan masalah ing Github, supaya wong liya uga bisa nulungi. Mangga lebokake informasi sabisane, kayata browser lan versi, sistem operasi lan versi, lan basa/swara sing sampeyan gunakake. Uga kalebu informasi babagan situs web tartamtu ing ngendi sampeyan ndeleng bug kasebut, luwih becik nganggo tautan.
frontend_faq013A.original: Yes, please! Preferably create an issue report on Github, so others can help out as well. Please include as much information as possible, such as which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using. Also include information regarding specific websites where you see the bug, preferably with a link.

frontend_faq014A.message: Biasane! Yen sampeyan bisa milih teks ing PDF, klik tengen banjur pilih Talkie ing menu. Yen teks ora bisa dipilih, yen minangka bagean saka gambar, mula ora bisa digunakake.
frontend_faq014A.original: Usually! If you can select the text in the PDF, right click on it and choose Talkie in the menu. If the text cannot be selected, if it is part of an image, then it will not work.

frontend_faq015A.message: Ora. Talkie nduweni panggunaan tanpa wates — sampeyan bisa maca akeh tembung lan teks dawa sing dikarepake.
frontend_faq015A.original: No. Talkie has unlimited usage — you can read as many words and as long texts as you like.

frontend_faq015Q.original: Does Talkie have a word limit?

frontend_faq016A.message: mesthi! Cukup hubungi kula liwat dhukungan utawa kaca proyek.
frontend_faq016A.original: Certainly! Just contact me through the support or project pages.

frontend_faq016Q.message: Apa aku bisa njaluk fitur anyar?

frontend_faq017A.message: Ana editor trabasan Keyboard, sing bisa ditemokake ing sisih ngisor kaca Ekstensi ing Google Chrome.
frontend_faq017A.original: There is a Keyboard shortcuts editor, which you can find at the bottom of the Extensions page in Google Chrome.

frontend_faq017Q.message: Kepiye carane ngganti tombol trabasan ing Google Chrome?
frontend_faq017Q.original: How to change shortcut keys in Google Chrome?

frontend_faq018A.message: Sampeyan bisa ngganti utawa mbusak tombol trabasan ing setelan Firefox kanggo Add-Ons. Klik tombol cogwheel kanggo nemokake editor tombol trabasan.
frontend_faq018A.original: You can change or remove shortcut keys in Firefox settings for Add-Ons. Click the cogwheel button to find the shortcut key editor.

frontend_faq018Q.message: Kepiye carane ngganti tombol trabasan ing Firefox?
frontend_faq018Q.original: How to change shortcut keys in Firefox?

frontend_faq019A.message: mesthi! Iku bakal apik kanggo njaluk bantuan nerjemahake Talkie , kanggo nyoba Talkie ing sistem anyar, kanggo neliti kewan omo, lan nambah fitur anyar. Mangga deleng kaca proyek kanggo instruksi.
frontend_faq019A.original: Certainly! It would be great to get help translating Talkie, to test Talkie on new systems, to investigate bugs, and to add new features. Please see the project page for instructions.

frontend_faq019Q.message: Apa aku bisa mbantu ngembangake Talkie ?

frontend_faq020A.message: Ya — tulung Talkie babagan Talkie! Bisa uga ngirim link menyang selebriti internet favorit, grup online, utawa buletin. Sampeyan malah bisa njaluk bos kanggo nginstal ing kabeh komputer ing karya, utawa guru kanggo nginstal ing sekolah. Talkie babagan Talkie banget dihargai!
frontend_faq020A.original: Yes — please tell your friends about Talkie! Perhaps send a link to your favorite internet celebrity, online group, or newsletter. You can even ask your boss to install it on all the computers at work, or your teacher to install it at school. Spreading the word about Talkie is very much appreciated!

frontend_faq020Q.message: Apa aku bisa mbantu Talkie cara liya?
frontend_faq020Q.original: Can I help Talkie in any other way?

frontend_faq021A.message: Perlu akeh wektu lan gaweyan kanggo ngembangake lan njaga Talkie — atusan jam nganti saiki. Nanging, Talkie gratis kanggo kabeh wong nggunakake sabisane. Kanggo ndhukung finansial luwih pangembangan, pangopènan lan tetep gratis Talkie gratis, sawetara fitur mung kasedhiya kanggo pangguna Talkie Premium
frontend_faq021A.original: It takes quite a lot of time and effort to develop and maintain Talkie — hundreds of hours so far. Yet, Talkie is free for everyone to use as much as they like. To financially support further both development, maintenance and keeping the free Talkie free, some features are only available to Talkie Premium users.

frontend_faq021Q.original: Why are there two editions of Talkie?

frontend_faq022A.message: Ya, ana macem-macem pilihan pembayaran sing kasedhiya.
frontend_faq022A.original: Yes, there are multiple payment options available.

frontend_faq022Q.message: Bisa mbayar nggunakake PayPal, transfer bank, etc?
frontend_faq022Q.original: Can I pay using PayPal, bank transfer, etcetera?

frontend_faq023A.message: Ya, yen sampeyan mbayar nggunakake PayPal utawa Stripe, sing nawakake manajemen mbalekaken prasaja. Mbalekaken umume ora kasedhiya kanggo cara pembayaran liyane amarga jumlah karya ekstra dibutuhake, plus risiko sing dhuwit bakal dibalekake menyang akun salah.
frontend_faq023A.original: Yes, if you paid using PayPal or Stripe, which offer simple refund management. Refunds are generally not available for other methods of payments due to the amount of extra work it requires, plus the risk that the money gets refunded to the wrong account.

frontend_faq024A.message: mesthi! Mung ngaktifake Talkie Premium kanggo nyoba metu.
frontend_faq024A.original: Sure! Just enable the Talkie Premium upgrade to try it out.

frontend_faq024Q.message: Apa aku bisa nyoba Talkie Premium gratis?
frontend_faq024Q.original: Can I try out Talkie Premium for free?

frontend_faq025A.message: Ora ana iklan, koleksi data, utawa nelusuri pangguna ing Talkie. Pangguna seneng sing mbayar Talkie Premium mung siji-sijine monetisasi.
frontend_faq025A.original: There is no advertisement, data collection, or user tracking in Talkie. Happy users paying for Talkie Premium is the only monetization.

frontend_faq025Q.message: Apa Talkie ngemot pariwara, ngumpulake data, utawa nglacak pangguna?
frontend_faq025Q.original: Does the Talkie extensions contain advertisement, collect data, or track users?

frontend_faq026A.message: Sistem kehormatan yaiku nalika individu dipercaya jujur, lan netepi pedoman tanpa pamriksan sing ketat. Kanggo Talkie Premium pitados bilih sing upgrade wis mbayar kanggo.
frontend_faq026A.original: The honor system is when individuals are trusted to be honest, and adhere to guidelines without strictly enforced checks. For Talkie Premium trusting that those who upgrade have paid for it.

frontend_faq027A.message: Amarga wong ing saindenging jagad nggunakake mata uang sing beda-beda, duwe tingkat penghasilan sing beda-beda, lan duwe tingkat penghargaan sing beda kanggo fitur Talkie Premium Ora ana rega tunggal lan tetep sing bisa digunakake kanggo kabeh wong ing saindenging jagad. Kajaba iku, fluktuasi mata uang, tren siklus ekonomi, variasi regional/intra-negara, lan liya-liyane. Umumé, setelan rega kanggo produk sing didol ing saindenging jagad rumit. Iku luwih gampang supaya saben wong nyetel rega dhewe, lan mesthekake yen produk cukup apik kanggo njamin pembayaran.
frontend_faq027A.original: Because people around the world use different currencies, have different levels of disposable income, and have different levels of appreciation for Talkie Premium's features. There is no single, fixed price that works well for everyone in the world. On top of that comes fluctuations in currencies, economic cycle trends, regional/intra-country variations, etcetera. All in all, settings prices for a product sold worldwide is complicated. It is easier to let everyone set their own price, and ensure that the product is good enough to warrant a payment.

frontend_faq027Q.message: Apa aku bisa nyetel rega dhewe?
frontend_faq027Q.original: Why can I set my own price?

frontend_faq028A.message: Awit aku ora ngerti carane akeh dhuwit sampeyan bisa nglampahi ing piranti lunak teks-kanggo-wicara, Aku luwih seneng sing mbayar apa sampeyan mikir Talkie Premium worth kanggo sampeyan — ora luwih, ora kurang. Yen sampeyan nggoleki kerangka referensi, nalika Google nangani pembayaran kanggo Talkie Premium biaya langganan $$25 (Dolar AS) saben taun ing Amerika Serikat. Elinga yen Google nyetel rega kanggo negara lan mata uang ing saindenging jagad supaya cocog karo kahanan lokal, saengga bisa uga kurang. Ing wektu sing padha, sapa wae sing takon kanthi sopan uga bisa nampa Talkie Premium kanthi gratis.
frontend_faq028A.original: Since I don't know how much money you are able to spend on text-to-speech software, I prefer that you pay what you think Talkie Premium is worth to you  — no more, no less. In case you are looking for a frame of reference, when Google handled payments for Talkie Premium the subscription cost $$25 (US Dollar) per year in the United States of America. Note that Google adjusted prices around for countries and currencies the world to match local conditions, so it could be more or less. At the same time, anyone who asked politely could also receive Talkie Premium for free.

frontend_faq028Q.message: Apa sampeyan menehi saran supaya aku mbayar?
frontend_faq028Q.original: How much do you recommend I pay?

frontend_faq029A.message: Amarga ngleksanakake sistem kanggo pembayaran lan verifikasi njupuk akèh wektu lan gaweyan, lan iku dianggep sing biaya implementasine verifikasi pembayaran ketat luwih saka losses saka individu mbeling sistem. Verifikasi pembayaran uga mbutuhake sawetara tingkat pangumpulan data saka sistem pangguna, lan pangguna sing trampil kanthi teknis kerep bisa ngupayakake verifikasi kasebut. Dadi saka perspektif teknis lan bisnis, sanajan ora ana jaminan, luwih gampang dipercaya manawa pangguna netepi sistem kehormatan.
frontend_faq029A.original: Because implementing a system for payments and verification takes a lot of time and effort, and it is assumed that the cost of implementing strict payment verification is higher than the losses from individuals cheating the system. Payment verification also requires some level of data collection from users' systems, and technically skilled users can often work around the verification anyways. So from a technical and business perspective, even though there are no guarantees, it is easier to simply trust that users adhere to the honor system.

frontend_faq029Q.original: Why is there no payment verification?

frontend_faq030A.message: Kaputusan kanggo ora ngleksanakake verifikasi pembayaran tegese jumlah sing dibayar ora bisa diverifikasi. Kajaba iku, biaya "manufaktur" salinan digital saka Talkie Premium nul, supaya menehi adoh kanggo apa-apa ora ateges mundhut financial kanggo pangembang. Ana uga pangarep-arep yen sampeyan seneng Talkie Premium , sampeyan bakal ngandhani kanca-kanca babagan iki. Menehi Talkie Premium uga bisa dideleng minangka upaya marketing.
frontend_faq030A.original: The decision to not implement payment verification means that the amount paid cannot be verified. In addition, the cost of "manufacturing" a digital copy of Talkie Premium is zero, so giving it away for nothing does not imply a financial loss for the developer. There is also the hope that if you like Talkie Premium, you will tell your friends about it. Giving away Talkie Premium can also be seen as a marketing effort.

frontend_faq030Q.message: Apa aku bisa milih ora mbayar apa-apa?
frontend_faq030Q.original: Why can I choose to pay nothing?

frontend_faq031A.message: Ya, kanthi nggunakake Stripe. Waca opsi pembayaran tambahan.
frontend_faq031A.original: Yes, by using Stripe. See additional payment options.

frontend_faq031Q.message: Apa aku bisa mbayar ulang saben wulan utawa tahunan?
frontend_faq031Q.original: Can I make a recurring monthly or yearly payment?

frontend_faq032A.message: Ya, yen sampeyan njaluk liwat email. Lebokna jeneng, alamat, lan pengenal pajak tambah nilai (utawa sing padha).
frontend_faq032A.original: Yes, if you request it via email. Please include your name, address, and optionally your value-added tax (VAT) identifier (or equivalent).

frontend_faq032Q.message: Apa aku bisa njaluk kuitansi kanggo pembayaran?
frontend_faq032Q.original: Can I get a receipt for my payment?

frontend_faq033A.message: Amarga sampeyan seneng karo fitur tambahan Talkie Premium nyedhiyakake, lan rasa seneng nyumbang kanggo pangembangan piranti lunak open source dening pangembang independen. Amarga biaya personel relatif dhuwur kanggo pembangunan lan pangopènan, nanging nul biaya "manufaktur" salinan digital, pembayaran kanggo Talkie Premium uga bisa katon minangka nyediakake support kanggo pembangunan lan pangopènan mangsa, minangka gantos kanggo Nilai saka produk ing wektu pembayaran. .
frontend_faq033A.original: Because you like the additional features Talkie Premium provides, and the happy feeling of contributing to open source software development by independent developers. Due to relatively high personell cost of development and maintenance, but zero cost of "manufacturing" digital copies, payments for Talkie Premium can also be seen as providing support for future development and maintenance, as opposed to the value of the product at the time of payment.

frontend_faq033Q.message: Apa aku kudu mbayar kanggo upgrade?
frontend_faq033Q.original: Why should I pay to upgrade?

frontend_faq034A.message: Jawaban singkat: mbokmenawa ora. Pranyata ana swara modern lan swara lawas ing Microsoft Windows. Nalika aku nyoba pungkasan, swara Walanda "Microsoft Frank" kasedhiya ing Microsoft Edge, nanging ora ing Google Chrome utawa Mozilla Firefox. Salah sawijining alesan yaiku sawetara swara dibangun kanggo sistem wicara WinRT sing luwih anyar, lan sawetara kanggo Interface Pemrograman Aplikasi Speech (SAPI) sing luwih lawas. Browser bisa uga ora ndhukung sistem wicara lawas lan anyar, tegese swara sing wis diinstal, bisa uga ora kasedhiya ing browser favorit. Sajrone wektu, umume brower bakal ndhukung sistem WinRT sing luwih anyar. Yen sampeyan ora ana swara ing basa sampeyan, salah sawijining saran yaiku nyoba nggunakake Talkie ing Microsoft Edge.
frontend_faq034A.original: The short answer is: probably not. It turns out there are modern voices and old voices on Microsoft Windows. When I last tested, the Dutch voice "Microsoft Frank" was available in Microsoft Edge, but not in Google Chrome nor Mozilla Firefox. One reason is that some voices are built for the newer WinRT speech system, and some for the older Speech Application Programming Interface (SAPI). Browsers may not support both the old and the new speech systems, meaning that a voice which is in fact installed, may still not be available in your favorite browser. Over time, most browers will probably support the newer WinRT system. If you are missing voices in your language, one suggestion is to try using Talkie in Microsoft Edge.

frontend_faq034Q.message: Apa kabeh swara kanggo Microsoft Windows bisa digunakake karo Talkie ?
frontend_faq034Q.original: Does all voices for Microsoft Windows work with Talkie?

frontend_faq035A.message: Mbok, kanthi akeh gaweyan. Ana uga sawetara workarounds ora resmi kanggo njaluk swara WinRT anyar bisa digunakake karo browser lawas SAPI-aktif, nanging iki gaweyan Highly technical lan ora dianjurake kanggo pangguna non-teknis.
frontend_faq035A.original: Perhaps, with a lot of effort. There are also some unofficial workarounds to get new WinRT voices to work with older SAPI-enabled browsers, but this is a highly technical endeavour and not recommended for non-technical users.

frontend_faq035Q.message: Bisa swara WinRT bisa ing browser SAPI-aktif ing Microsoft Windows?
frontend_faq035Q.original: Can WinRT voices work in SAPI-enabled browsers on Microsoft Windows?

frontend_faq036A.message: Ya, sawetara uga. Tindakake pandhuan instalasi kanggo sistem lan browser sampeyan. Sawise swara kasebut diinstal ing browser sampeyan, Talkie kudu ndeteksi kanthi otomatis. Mangga nuduhake tips sing sampeyan duwe!
frontend_faq036A.original: Yes, some do. Follow the installation instructions for your system and browser. Once the voices are installed in your browser, Talkie should detect them automatically. Please share any tips you have!

frontend_faq036Q.message: Apa swara open source bisa digunakake karo Talkie ?
frontend_faq036Q.original: Do open source voices work with Talkie?

frontend_featuresEdition_Free.message: Saiki nggunakake edisi gratis Talkie , lan sawetara fitur winates kasedhiya. Mbok menawa Talkie Premium bakal dadi pilihan sing luwih apik kanggo sampeyan?
frontend_featuresEdition_Free.original: Currently using the free edition of Talkie, and a limited set of features is available. Perhaps Talkie Premium would be a better choice for you?

frontend_featuresEdition_Premium.message: Saiki nggunakake Talkie Premium , lan kabeh fitur kasedhiya. Matur nuwun kanthi sanget, atiku anget!
frontend_featuresEdition_Premium.original: Currently using Talkie Premium, and all features are available. Thank you very much, it warms my heart!

frontend_featuresEditions.message: Talkie ing rong edisi: Talkie lan Talkie Premium. Edisi gratis apik kanggo umume kasus panggunaan, nanging edisi premium nawakake opsi lan fitur tambahan.
frontend_featuresEditions.original: Talkie comes in two editions: Talkie and Talkie Premium. The free edition is great for most use cases, but the premium edition offers additional options and features.

frontend_featuresFree_List03.message: Maca teks sing dipilih kanthi ngeklik tombol, tombol trabasan, utawa menu klik-tengen.
frontend_featuresFree_List03.original: Reads selected text by a button click, shortcut key, or right-click menu.

frontend_featuresFree_List04.message: Maca teks lan artikel dawa kanthi banter, sanajan tab ana ing latar mburi.
frontend_featuresFree_List04.original: Reads long texts and articles out loud, even while the tab is in the background.

frontend_featuresFree_List05.message: Kode mbukak sumber lan kasedhiya gratis kanggo kabeh pangguna.
frontend_featuresFree_List05.original: Code is open source and available for free to all users.

frontend_featuresPremium_List01.message: Pilih swara standar sampeyan dhewe kanggo saben basa. Apik yen sampeyan kesel karo swara sistem!
frontend_featuresPremium_List01.original: Choose your own default voice for each language. Great if you get tired of the system voice!

frontend_featuresPremium_List02.message: Pilih kacepetan maca lan nada saben swara. Setel swara sing disenengi!
frontend_featuresPremium_List02.original: Choose reading speed and pitch per voice. Adjust voices to your liking!

frontend_featuresPremium_List03.message: Perasaan anget lan kabur sing sampeyan entuk nalika ndhukung piranti lunak sumber terbuka dening pangembang independen.
frontend_featuresPremium_List03.original: That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when supporting open source software by independent developers.

frontend_featuresPremium_List04.original: Future Premium updates included without additional cost.

frontend_featuresPremium_List05.message: Wacanen teks saka clipboard! Mung nyalin teks saka ngendi wae ing program sembarang, lan nggunakake Talkie Premium kanggo maca!
frontend_featuresPremium_List05.original: Read text from the clipboard! Just copy text from anywhere in any program, and use Talkie Premium to read it!

frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFound.message: Mangga instal sawetara swara ing sistem sampeyan, Talkie ora Talkie ora bakal bisa. Nuwun sewu!
frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFound.original: Please install some voices on your system, otherwise Talkie will not work. Sorry!

frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFoundHeadin.message: Ora ana swara text-to-speech sing ditemokake

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Kabeh kontribusi kanggo Talkie digawe miturut Contributor License Agreement (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.original: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie dikembangake sawetara dina sadurunge Taun Anyar 2016/2017, kanthi tantangan saka kanca. Tantangan kasebut diwiwiti kanthi pitakonan: nalika lelungan menyang kantor, apa bisa ngrungokake artikel tinimbang maca? Gampang, ujarku, lan nyoba mbuktekake — utawa paling ora nggawe browserku nganggo teks nggunakake swara komputer sing ora sopan. Edisi dhasar, tanpa antarmuka panganggo, dadi ora pati penting kanggo nggawe. Nambahake antarmuka panganggo, njupuk dicokot maneh. Nambahake kode deteksi basa sing tepat. Ngatasi kewan omo ing browser malah luwih karya. Dhaptar dandan lan fitur terus — lan sawetara ewu baris kode mengko, sampeyan lagi ndeleng asil pungkasan.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it — or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic edition, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on — and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.message: Matur nuwun kanggo nggunakake Talkie — yen seneng, marang kanca-kanca!
frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie — if you like it, tell your friends!

frontend_supportDescription.message: Duwe pitakonan? Perlu bantuan karo soko? Kanggo jawaban cepet kanggo pitakonan umum, deleng pitakonan sing kerep ditakoni ing ngisor iki. Yen ora menehi wangsulan, kirimake pitakon apa wae sing sampeyan duwe. Aku bakal seneng yen pengalaman sampeyan nggunakake $NAME$ lancar lan nyenengake!
frontend_supportDescription.original: Have a question? Need help with something? For fast answers to common questions, see the frequently asked questions below. If that does not give you an answer, please send me any questions you might have. I would be happy if your experience using $NAME$ is smooth and enjoyable!

frontend_upgradeExplanation01.message: Rega kanggo Talkie Premium ora tetep. Nanging sampeyan mbayar apa sing arep, gumantung carane akeh sampeyan mikir fitur premium worth kanggo sampeyan. Sampeyan malah bisa mutusaké kanggo mbayar apa-apa.
frontend_upgradeExplanation01.original: The price for Talkie Premium is not fixed. Instead you pay what you want, depending on how much you think the premium features are worth to you. You can even decide to pay nothing.

frontend_upgradeExplanation02.message: Sawise ngirim pembayaran, ora ana kode upgrade sing kudu dilebokake, ora ana akun pangguna sing kudu didaftar, utawa verifikasi pembayaran liyane. Nanging Talkie Premium nggunakake sistem pakurmatan.
frontend_upgradeExplanation02.original: After sending the payment there are no upgrade codes to enter, no user accounts to register, or any other payment verification in place. Instead Talkie Premium uses the honor system.

frontend_upgradeExplanation03.message: Elinga yen Talkie ora duwe pariwara, pelacakan pangguna, utawa koleksi data minangka cara monetisasi alternatif. Pembayaran diwenehi label minangka sumbangan kanggo pangembangan piranti lunak open source.
frontend_upgradeExplanation03.original: Please note that Talkie does not have any advertising, user tracking, or data collection as alternate means of monetization. Payments are labeled as donations for open source software development.

frontend_upgradeLabel.original: I have paid for Talkie Premium

frontend_upgradePaymentAlternativesLinkT.message: Cara pembayaran liyane liwat kaca sumbangan
frontend_upgradePaymentAlternativesLinkT.original: More payment methods via the donations page

frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.message: Sampeyan uga bisa milih teks, banjur klik tengen ing, lan pilih Talkie ing menu. Cara iki uga dianggo ing PDF-file lan sawetara jinis khusus saka kaca ing browser.
frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.original: You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in the browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.message: Iki minangka tombol trabasan sing disaranake, sing bisa diganti saka kaca setelan ekstensi browser sampeyan.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.original: These are the suggested shortcut keys, which can be changed from the extension settings page of your browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.message: Biasane ana konflik antarane trabasan keyboard saka ekstensi lan program sing beda-beda. Yen tombol trabasan ora bisa digunakake, priksa manawa tombol kasebut durung dikonfigurasi kanggo liya.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.original: It is common that there are conflicts between the keyboard shortcuts of different extensions and programs. If a shortcut key does not work, please make sure that it is not already configured for something else.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative05.message: Priksa utawa ganti Talkie tombol trabasan.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative05.original: Check or change the Talkie shortcut keys.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.message: Pilihan sing trep yaiku nggunakake tombol trabasan Talkie
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.original: A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:

frontend_usageStep01.message: Pilih teks sing dikarepake ing kaca web apa wae.
frontend_usageStep01.original: Select desired text on any web page.

frontend_usageStep02.message: Klik Talkie ing toolbar browser sampeyan
frontend_usageStep02.original: Click the Talkie button in your browser toolbar

frontend_voicesDefaultVoiceForDialect.original: The default voice for the dialect $LANGUAGE_CODE$ is $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesDefaultVoiceForLanguage.original: The default voice for the language $LANGUAGE_GROUP$ is $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesDescription.message: Deleng lan nyoba swara sing diinstal kanggo saben basa ing browser sampeyan. Talkie Premium uga bisa milih swara favorit minangka standar saben basa, uga nyetel kacepetan lan nada kanggo saben swara.
frontend_voicesDescription.original: See and test installed voices for each language in your browser. Talkie Premium users can also select their favorite voice as the default per language, as well as set speed and pitch for each voice.

frontend_voicesListenToVoiceSample.description: The $VOICE$ the name of the voice
frontend_voicesListenToVoiceSample.original: Listen to a voice sample of $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesPitchEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesPitchHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesRateEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesRateHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesSampleText.description: The original sentence is a popuplar English pangram. Translators are encouraged to use pangrams in their own languages. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pangram
frontend_voicesSampleText.message: Rubah coklat cepet mlumpat liwat asu kesed.
frontend_voicesSampleText.original: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.description: The $LANGUAGE$ is the name (or ISO 639 code such as sv or sv-SE) of the language, the $VOICE$ the name of the voice
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.message: Gunakake $VOICE$ minangka swara standar kanggo teks ing $LANGUAGE$
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.original: Use $VOICE$ as default voice for text in $LANGUAGE$

frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.message: Kanggo unclutter antarmuka panganggo, sawetara rincian ora ditampilake minangka standar. Yen sampeyan ngaktifake pilihan iki, informasi tambahan bakal ditampilake.
frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.original: To unclutter the user interface, some details are not shown by default. If you enable this option, additional information will be shown.

frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.message: Iki kalebu informasi dhukungan kanggo browser lan sistem operasi liyane.
frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.original: This includes support information for other browsers and operating systems.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.message: Ing sawetara browser, ora bisa maca teks sing dawa terus-terusan. Talkie iki, Talkie ngenalake jeda cilik ing antarane ukara/klausa lan sawise tandha wacan liyane.
frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.original: In some browsers, it is not possible to read long texts continuously. To work around this, Talkie introduces a small pause between sentences/clauses and after other punctuation.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.message: Yen sampeyan ngaktifake pilihan iki lan maca teks dawa mandheg sawise 10-20 detik, mateni maneh.
frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.original: If you enable this option and reading long texts stops after 10-20 seconds, please disable it again.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsLabel.message: Maca teks sing luwih dawa tanpa ngaso (eksperimen)

frontend_voicesTalkiePremiumPitch.message: Kanthi Talkie Premium sampeyan bisa ngganti swara standar kanggo saben basa, uga swara lan nada kanggo saben swara.
frontend_voicesTalkiePremiumPitch.original: With Talkie Premium you can change the default voice for each language, as well as voice and pitch for each voice.

frontend_welcomeHero01.message: Sugeng rawuh ing $NAME$! Sampeyan saiki nggunakake salah siji ekstensi browser text-to-speech sing paling apik ing donya.
frontend_welcomeHero01.original: Welcome to $NAME$! You are now using one of the best text-to-speech browser extensions in the world.

frontend_welcomeHero02.message: Terus pilih teks iki, banjur klik tombol $NAME$ ing toolbar browser. Seneng!
frontend_welcomeHero02.original: Go ahead and select this text, then click the $NAME$ button in the browser toolbar. Enjoy!

frontend_welcomeInstallMoreVoicesDescrip.message: Talkie saiki bisa nemokake $VOICES_COUNT$ swara sing $LANGUAGE_GROUPS_COUNT$ basa ing $LANGUAGES_COUNT$ dialek sing diinstal ing browser $SYSTEM_TYPE_PRETTY_NAME$ mlaku ing sistem operasi $OSTYPE_PRETTY_NAME$
frontend_welcomeInstallMoreVoicesDescrip.original: Talkie can currently find $VOICES_COUNT$ voices enabling $LANGUAGE_GROUPS_COUNT$ languages in $LANGUAGES_COUNT$ dialects installed in your $SYSTEM_TYPE_PRETTY_NAME$ browser running on a $OSTYPE_PRETTY_NAME$ operating system.

noTextSelectedMessage.message: Pilih teks sing dikarepake ing situs web dhisik. Sampeyan uga bisa milih teks, banjur klik tengen, banjur pilih Talkie ing menu.
noTextSelectedMessage.original: Please select desired text on the website first. You can also select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu.

notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.description: Some tabs can't be accessed by WebExtensions, such as chrome:// and the Chrome Web Store/Firefox Add-ons. This message warns users.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.message: Talkie ora bisa ngakses teks sing dipilih saka jinis kaca iki. Iku kaca khusus banget, lan ana watesan keamanan sing dilebokake ing browser. Sampeyan uga bisa nyoba kanggo milih teks, banjur klik tengen ing, lan milih Talkie ing menu. Nuwun sewu.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.original: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser. You can also try to select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.message: Nyuwun pangapunten, nanging maca teks saka clipboard minangka fitur Talkie Premium Apa sampeyan wis nimbang nganyarke?
readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.original: I'm sorry, but reading text from the clipboard is a Talkie Premium feature. Have you considered upgrading?

readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.message: Nyuwun pangapunten, nanging browser iki ora ndhukung maca saka clipboard. Durung, paling ora. Coba maneh ing sasi utawa luwih!
readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.original: I'm sorry, but this browser does not support reading from the clipboard. Not yet, at least. Please try again in one month or so!

readClipboardNeedsPermission.message: Talkie ora duwe idin kanggo ngakses saka clipboard. Ora apa-apa, nanging maca teks clipboard ora bakal bisa.
readClipboardNeedsPermission.original: Talkie does not have permission to access from the clipboard. That's ok, but then reading the clipboard text won't work.

readClipboardNoSuitableText.message: Ora bisa nemokake teks sing cocog ing clipboard. Apa sampeyan bisa nyoba nyalin sing liya?
readClipboardNoSuitableText.original: Could not find suitable text in the clipboard. Can you try copying something else?
